TopicTitle: Looking for a working automated science plugin

Articles.Content:
I just want my science experiments get triggered automatically.

There have been multiple mods (KerboKatz Automated Science) for this purpose over the time, but none of the ones I know is working for KSP 1.7+

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/95531-14x-automatedsciencesampler-v135-28042018/
https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/107803-142-forscience-v152-your-science-autopilot/

Is there a working one, that I am missing?

That first one is reported to be working in 1.6.1, which means there's a good chance it will work in 1.7.  Have you tried just installing the mod(s) and seeing if it works, or are you just going off the non-update thread titles?

Kerbokatz ASS works for me for 1.7 (ckan). (http://kerbokatz.github.io/)

as does :

as with all things, your mileage may vary.

Edited April 25, 2019 by zer0Kerbal

I use ForScience and it does exactly what you ask. The only time it "doesn't work" is when you first launch (because it only checks when the biome situation changes, and when you launch it didn't "change" so much as "become"), and I consider that a feature in that it gives you a chance to disable it if you want, for say challenges and whatnot.

 

EDIT: I see you saw ForScience. I can assure you it works just fine in 1.7, as do about 99% of the mods listed for any version past 1.3.

Thank you for all your answers, I used ForScience and it did not work at first, but after uninstall, save and then a clean reinstall the icon showed up on my bar and experiments started I can confirm that ForScience! v1.5.2 will work for KSP 1.7, although it is not marked as compatible (at least in CKAN).
